subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wright-Phillips scored in the 77th minute and the 90th minute as the Red Bulls rallied to defeat Sporting Kansas City, last year’s M.L.S. Cup winner, and advance to the Eastern Conference semifinals.
snippet: Bradley Wright-Phillips scored in the 77th minute and the 90th minute as the Red Bulls rallied to defeat Sporting Kansas City, last year’s M.L.S. Cup winner, and advance to the Eastern Conference semifinals.
